contents.product_name: Steal The Spotlight Leopard Slit Midi Dress
contents.discription: Steal the spotlight looking so fierce in this leopard midi dress! It features spaghetti straps, a v-neckline, and a front slit perfect for showing off some skin and strappy sandals.

Show off your alluring trendy style in this sleek curve-hugging midi dress! It features a cross-front halter neckline with tie-back straps, a cold-shoulder design with long fitted sleeves, and a midi-length asymmetric hem creating a chic high side slit. The smooth knit fabric includes a full lining. Complete the look with your fave mules.

Look and feel good in this rib knit maxi dress perfect for everyday styling! It features long sleeves, a turtleneck, a form-hugging silhouette, and a side-slit accent. Complete the look in mules for a dinner date.

Who resist your charm the second you stroll in looking fabulous in this satin a-line dress! It features a sleeveless mock neck with dual button closures, a pleated open-back design, and a short-length hem. Style with an envelope clutch and heels to complete the look!

contents.product_name: Cream Of The Crop Cutout Mini Dress
contents.discription: Look and feel your absolute best in this prize-worthy casual mini dress! It features a sleeveless, one-shoulder neckline with a thin shoulder strap, a sultry cutout waist with a hoop insert, and a bodycon silhouette. Complete the look in clear strap heels for a lunch date.

contents.product_name: Playful In Crepe Color Block Dress
contents.discription: Play up your fun and wild side in this crepe mini dress featuring a sleeveless scoop neck, spaghetti straps, a color block design with zebra print, and a form-hugging silhouette. Style with lace-up stilettos for the perf club look!
